title: Will ‘Yellow Cards’ Help Fix Cycling’s Safety Problem? UCI to Trial Series of Wild New Plans from Tour de France
content:
'The safety of riders is a priority': Governing body to test 'cards', curbs on race radios, and more as tension mounts following flurry of devastating crashes.

Read the full article at Will ‘Yellow Cards’ Help Fix Cycling’s Safety Problem? UCI to Trial Series of Wild New Plans from Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
